Package com.onebucket.global.exceptionManage

package com.onebucket.global.exceptionManage
This package provide Exception, ExceptionHandler, ExceptionResponse, etc...

Use Define errorCode, describe on errorCode package.
Also handle error by catching exception from servlet on exceptionHandler package.
Redefine, or custom exceptions are in exceptions package.

1. error code

Other enum type error codes are implements errorCode interface. Basically, it includes name, code, status, message, type
The numerical codes for these error codes follow a specific pattern as described below:
series describe
1000 series Exceptions related to user, security, authentication, and authorization issues.
2000 series General exceptions, such as invalid parameters or database errors.
3000 series Specific database exceptions.

1.1 [1000] series error code


1.1.1 UserErrorCode

Provide error code with userDetails status, or signIn Exception. invalid input: '<'table border= "userErrorCode";"> name code status LOCK_USER 1001 forbidden(403) EXPIRED_USER 1002 forbidden(403) BANNED_USER 1003 forbidden(403) USERNAME_PASSWORD
_INVALID 1004 unauthorized(401) CREDENTIALS_EXPIRED 1005 unauthorized(401) UNSUPPORTED
_ACCOUNT_EXCEPTION 1099 internal server error(500) 
- 1001 : locked in UserDetails by authorization or security issue.
- 1002 : user should update password or else.
- 1003 : banned user by admin or security issue.
- 1004 : incorrect password or username.
- 1005 : user has expired account.
- 1099 : unsupported internal server error.

1.1.2 JwtErrorCode

Provide error code with jwt token, for refresh or access denied protocol in client. Its for JwtAuthenticationFilter to make response entity with json, not for handling in exceptionHandler. So, just provide numeric code, name and type(JWT_ERROR), and no HttpStatus. invalid input: '<'table border= "JwtErrorCode";"> name code status EXPIRED_TOKEN 1100 null INVALID_SIGNATURE_TOKEN 1101 null INVALID_CLAIM_TOKEN 1102 null INVALID_FORM_TOKEN 1103 null AUTHORITY_NOT_FOUND_TOKEN 1104 null UNSUPPORTED_JWT_ERROR 1199 null

1.1.3 RegisterErrorCode

Provide error when user try to register. Bad request, or else like verified email or create profile. Type of this error is REGISTER_ERROR. invalid input: '<'table border= "RegisterErrorCode";"> name code status UNSUPPORTED_SCHOOL 1200 bad request(400) INVALID_EMAIL_FORM 1201 bad request(400) INVALID_VERIFIED_CODE 1103 bad request(400) UNSUPPORTED_VERIFIED_ERROR 1199 internal server error(500) 
 1200 : no school in database.
 1201 : no matching with school and email.
 1202 : invalid code.
 1299 : unsupported error.

1.2 [2000] series error code


1.2.1 CommonErrorCode

Provide error code caused by communication with client and server, notFound, else Type is COMMON_ERROR. invalid input: '<'table border= "RegisterErrorCode";"> name code status INVALID_PARAMETER 2001 bad request(400) RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND 2002 not found(404) INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR 2003 internal server error(500)
